title: Oral Health Probiotic by Success Chemistry - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Achieve a healthier mouth and fresh breath with Oral Health Probiotic by Success Chemistry®. This advanced formula features beneficial probiotics designed to balance your oral microbiome, reducing harmful bacteria that can lead to plaque buildup, gum disease, and bad breath. Ideal for natural dental hygiene improvement, our supplement promotes healthier teeth and gums. Key Benefits:
  • Promotes Fresh Breath: Balances the oral microbiome to reduce bad breath.
  • Supports Healthy Teeth and Gums: Reduces plaque and prevents gum disease.
  • Balances Oral Microbiome: Introduces beneficial bacteria for optimal oral health.
  • Prevents Plaque and Gum Disease: Regular use helps prevent common dental issues.
  • Advanced MAKTREK Bi-Pass Technology: Ensures probiotics survive stomach acid and reach the mouth effectively.
Ingredients:
  • Proprietary Blend (40 Billion CFU):
    • Lactobacillus Acidophilus (La-14)
    • Bifidobacterium Lactis (Bl-04)
    • Lactobacillus Plantarum (Lp-115)
    • Lactobacillus Paracasei (Lpc-37)
  • Complex Marine Polysaccharide and Fructooligosaccharide: Support beneficial bacteria growth and act as a prebiotic.
Why Choose Oral Health Probiotic?
  • High-Quality Probiotic Strains: Contains potent strains known for oral health benefits.
  • Advanced Delivery System: MAKTREK Bi-Pass Technology maximizes effectiveness.
  • Natural and Safe: Free from artificial additives, preservatives, and allergens.
  • Comprehensive Oral Health Support: Supports fresh breath and overall oral wellness.
Achieve Optimal Oral Health Naturally: Incorporate Success Chemistry® Oral Health Probiotic into your routine for improved dental hygiene and a balanced oral microbiome. Experience a fresher mouth and enhanced oral wellness naturally!
shortDescriptionHtml: Maintain fresh breath and healthy teeth with Success Chemistry¬Æ Oral Health Probiotic. Our advanced formula with 40 Billion CFU and MAKTREK technology supports oral health by balancing the microbiome in your mouth. 60 capsules per bottle.
supplementFacts:

Complex Marine Polysaccharide 60 mg **

Other Ingredients: Hypromellose (vegetable capsule), Rice maltodextrin, L-Leucine.
